function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Cognitive overload leading to mistrust and misinformation sharing","Impact":"Increased spread of misinformation and mistrust in health information","Mitigation":"Reduce cognitive load through targeted interventions and information organization","Technologies":"Information organization tools, cognitive load monitoring technology","People":"General public, individuals reading online information","Owner":"Health organizations, information platforms, researchers"},{"Description":"Impact of cognitive load on health and information factors during COVID-19","Impact":"Potential increase in misinformation sharing and cyberchondria","Mitigation":"Future work measuring cognitive load and its impact on health and information factors","Technologies":"Cognitive load measurement technology, data analysis tools","People":"Researchers, public health officials","Owner":"Research institutions, public health organizations"},{"Description":"Alleviating misinformation sharing and cyberchondria through reducing cognitive load","Impact":"Reduced spread of misinformation and lower levels of cyberchondria during pandemics","Mitigation":"Empirical investigation to reduce cognitive load and its impact on misinformation sharing and cyberchondria","Technologies":"Cognitive load reduction interventions, data analysis tools","People":"Practitioners, scholars, individuals experiencing cognitive load","Owner":"Research institutions, public health organizations"}]}
